MediaDevicesSelectAudioOutput.summary:
The method selectAudioOutput() prompts the user to select a specific audio output device, for example a speaker or headset.
On success, the returned {{jsxref("Promise")}} is resolved with a describing the selected device.

remarks.para: -WebRTC - the introductory page to the API

MediaDevicesSelectAudioOutput.returns:
A {{ jsxref("Promise") }} that receives a object when the promise is fulfilled.
The object describes the user-selected audio output device.
